attributes.action: CLOSE THE LEGAL LOOPHOLE IN THE LAW THAT ALLOWS AIR RIFLES AND HAND GUNS TO BE PURCHASED WITHOUT A LICENCE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present you can purchase certain air rifles and hand guns without a licence. Some irresponsible gunshop owners knowing this is a legal loophole, highly motivated by profit and greed openly flaunt the law, much to their discredit.

By the very nature of the subject and the articles sold the average member of the public would not wish to 'rock the perverbial boat' but the UK today needs more controls and laws to harness in such issues.

One idiot of a gun shop owner actually made a statement about air rifles:

"When did you ever hear of anyone being killed by an air rifle?"

A reality check is needed.

Perhaps he should visit the reputable GCN (Gun Control) Network website for all the sad statistics, sooner rather than later.

Enough is enough.

Helen Drury.
